name: Gallerya
author: netzstrategen

sections.description: Gallerya transforms the WordPress native post gallery into a full fledged slideshow with features like images thumbnails stripe and lightbox support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire gallerya folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Requirements

  • PHP 7.0 or later.
sections.changelog:
3.2.3

Fixed missing fallback in case array key is not defined.

3.2.2

Remove variation images to be added to main gallery in GraphQL requests.

3.2.1

Fixed GraphQL video source enum type not nullable.

3.2.0

Adds GraphQL support for video field.

3.1.0

Adds compatibility with woo-product-gallery-slider.

Updated dev dependencies.
Fixed some issues.

short_description: Change the native post gallery to be displayed as a slider with lightbox support.
description: Gallerya transforms the WordPress native post gallery into a full fledged slideshow with features like images thumbnails stripe and lightbox support.
